mapper.insert: insert into notice (user_no, notice_title, create_date, notice_content, status) values (#{userNo}, #{noticeTitle}, #{createDate}, #{noticeContent}, #{status})
mapper.update: update notice set notice_title = #{noticeTitle}, notice_content = #{noticeContent} where notice_no = #{noticeNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from notice where notice_no = #{noticeNo} and user_no = #{userNo}
